body:
### Problem

```
==> Upgrading neovim
  HEAD-2028d1e -> HEAD-23c21e7

==> cmake -S . -B build -DLUV_LIBRARY=/opt/homebrew/opt/luv/lib/libluv.dylib -DLIBUV_L
==> cmake --build build

cd /tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/src/nvim && /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/include -isystem /opt/homebrew/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/nlua0.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/nlua0.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/nlua0.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/src/nlua0.c
[  4%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o
cd /tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/src/nvim && /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/include -isystem /opt/homebrew/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC  -Wno-conversion -Wno-missing-noreturn -Wno-missing-format-attribute -Wno-double-promotion -Wno-strict-prototypes -Wno-misleading-indentation -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/src/mpack/mpack_core.c
[  4%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/rpc.c.o
cd /tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/src/nvim && /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/build/include -isystem /opt/homebrew/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC  -Wno-conversion -Wno-missing-noreturn -Wno-missing-format-attribute -Wno-double-promotion -Wno-strict-prototypes -Wno-misleading-indentation -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/rpc.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/rpc.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/rpc.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230921-34978-2r83ow/src/mpack/rpc.c

gmake: *** [Makefile:159: all] Error 2


READ THIS: https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting

```

### Steps to reproduce

`brew upgrade`

### Expected behavior

Would upgrade successfully

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.10.0-dev-413+g2028d1e2b-Homebrew

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

No

### Operating system/version

macOS 13.5.2

### Terminal name/version

wezterm 20230717-111633-94ab0496

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256 color

### Installation

homebrew

comment_data.body:
Not supported by us or by homebrew.

Duplicate of https://github.com/neovim/neovim/issues/25255

title: [MacOS] Cannot upgrade Neovim with Homebrew
